scripts.//: Default start points to start:safe to keep CI stable and avoid OOM (exit 137). Use start:ultralowmem or ci:serve-static for extreme constraints.
scripts.prestart: mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r ../assets/* public/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && [ -f public/healthz.html ] || (mkdir -p public && printf '<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\"><head><meta charset=\"UTF-8\"><title>OK</title></head><body>OK</body></html>' > public/healthz.html)
scripts.start:ci: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start
scripts.start:safe: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start
scripts.start:lowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start
scripts.start:ultralowmem: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=192 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start
scripts.start:memcap: cross-env CI=true NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=256 npm run start:safe
scripts.ci:start:ultra: cross-env CI=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=false BROWSER=none WDS_SOCKET_PORT=0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=192 node_modules/.bin/react-scripts start
scripts.ci:dev: npm run start:ultralowmem & npm run ci:health
scripts.ci:serve-static: npm run start:static:safe & npm run ci:health
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r ../assets/* public/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && [ -f public/healthz.html ] || (mkdir -p public && printf '<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang=\"en\"><head><meta charset=\"UTF-8\"><title>OK</title></head><body>OK</body></html>' > public/healthz.html) && echo "postinstall: assets copied" >/dev/null
